text:
Attribute: dir
Description: The directory to delete files from.

Using dir deletes everything 
including this directory. It is not the directory to delete files from. I takes long time to realize this.
The 
doc also says that at least file or dir is required. That is not true when using a fileset. Then it can be omitted.

Thomas:
Would you be able to supply a patch to the documentation that explains it 
better?
creator: umagesh@apache.org

text:
It's in the documentation for the delete task. It states that delete requires either a file 
attribute or a dir attribute. Using a fileset none of these are nessesary. It took me some time to 
find out why the root (base) dir was deleted as well.
